text: Ronald Lawrence George (born March 20, 1970) is a former American football linebacker who played in the National Football League from 1993 through 2000. He played college football at Stanford University and the United States Air Force Academy. He was an All-American in 1992 as a senior at Stanford. ==External links== *NFL.com player page Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American football linebackers Category:Stanford Cardinal football players Category:Air Force Falcons football players Category:Atlanta Falcons players Category:Minnesota Vikings players Category:Kansas City Chiefs players
title: Ron George (American football)
